meanings.sent1: She is always so gabbing during class discussions.
meanings.sent2: The gabbing parrot entertained the visitors with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent3: The gabbing squirrel in the park seemed to have a lot to say about the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her gabbing nature was like a bubbling brook, never running out of words.
meanings.sent5: The gabbing toddler filled the room with laughter and stories.

meanings.definition: Engaging in idle chatter or gossip
meanings.sent1: Stop gabbing and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: They were gabbing about the latest celebrity scandal.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends spent hours gabbing about their weekend plans.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was gabbing away her time instead of being productive.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors were always gabbing over the fence about each other's business.

meanings.definition: To chat or converse in a casual or familiar manner
meanings.sent1: We were just gabbing about our favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys gabbing with her friends over a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent3: The old friends spent the evening gabbing about the good old days.
meanings.sent4: They were gabbing like long-lost siblings reunited after years apart.
meanings.sent5: The couple could be heard gabbing happily as they walked hand in hand.
